definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: Coppersmiths employed it to fashion pots and kettles for the home.
sentences.chinese: 銅匠們利用它來爲家庭製造罐子和水壺。

sentences.english: The elderly grey-haired man is a coppersmith by trade.
sentences.chinese: 那個回頭發上了年紀的人是銅匠。

sentences.english: The elderly grey - haired man is a coppersmith by trade.
sentences.chinese: 那個灰頭髮上了年紀的人是銅匠。

sentences.english: Luther's Father, worked as a copper smith during Luther's childhood.
sentences.chinese: 在路德童年的時候，他的父親是一名銅匠。

definition: lit. as if sitting on pins and needles (idiom)/fig. to be in an uncomfortable situation
to engage in fraudulent activities (idiom)/skulduggery/to hoodwink people/to cheat sb audaciously
variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
supplementary cash reserve/private fund/private hoard/slush fund
seize every minute and second (idiom); not a minute to lose/every moment counts
Long Xing Quan - "Dragon Fist" - Martial Art
